languages.text: "Не успел. Шел помолиться, когда услышал стрельбу и помчался со всех ног. А затем увидел господина фактотума и... Кажется, дальше я просто зажимал его рану и сквернословил". {n}Инфернус-мастер растерянно смотрит на окровавленные ладони.{/n} "Мда, тоже мне герой-ремонтник. Немного же от меня оказалось пользы".

"I did not. I was on my way to offer a prayer when I heard gunfire and ran as fast as I could. When I got here, I saw Master Danrok, and... I think the next thing I did was just to press his wound and spout curses." {n}Einrich looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I wasn't much use, was I?"
languages.original_text: "Не успел. Шел помолиться, когда услышал стрельбу и помчался со всех ног. А затем увидел господина фактотума и... Кажется, дальше я просто зажимал его рану и сквернословил". {n}Инфернус-мастер растерянно смотрит на окровавленные ладони.{/n} "Мда, тоже мне герой-ремонтник. Немного же от меня оказалось пользы".

traits.locale_text: "I did not. I was on my way to offer a prayer when I heard gunfire and ran as fast as I could. And then I saw Master Factotum, and... I think the next thing I did was just squeeze his wound, spouting blasphemies." {n}The Infernus Master looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I was not much use, was I?"

"I did not. I was on my way to offer a prayer when I heard gunfire and ran as fast as I could. And then I saw Master Factotum, and... I think the next thing I did was just squeeze his wound, spouting blasphemies." {n}The Infernus Master looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I was not much use, was I?"

I think the next thing I did was just to press his wound and spout curses." {n}The Infernus Master looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I was not much use, was I?"

"I did not. I was on my way to offer a prayer when I heard gunfire and ran as fast as I could. And then I saw Master Factotum, and... I think the next thing I did was just to press his wound and spout curses." {n}The Infernus Master looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I was not much use, was I?"

"I did not. I was on my way to offer a prayer when I heard gunfire and ran as fast as I could. When I got here, I saw Master Danrok, and... I think the next thing I did was just to press his wound and spout curses." {n}Einrich looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I wasn't much use, was I?"

"I did not. I was on my way to offer a prayer when I heard gunfire and ran as fast as I could. When I got here, I saw Master Danrok, and... I think the next thing I did was just to press his wound and spout curses." {n}Einrich looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I wasn't much use, was I?"

languages.text: "Nein. Ich war unterwegs und wollte beten, dann hörte ich Schüsse und rannte so schnell wie möglich los. Als ich hier ankam, sah ich Meister Danrok und ... als Nächstes habe ich auf seine Wunde gedrückt und geflucht." {n}Einrich blickt verwirrt auf seine blutigen Hände.{/n} "Von wegen heldenhafter Mechaniker. Ich war nicht von großem Nutzen, oder?"
languages.original_text: "I did not. I was on my way to offer a prayer when I heard gunfire and ran as fast as I could. When I got here, I saw Master Danrok, and... I think the next thing I did was just to press his wound and spout curses." {n}Einrich looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I wasn't much use, was I?"

traits.locale_text: "Nein. Ich war unterwegs und wollte beten, dann hörte ich Schüsse und rannte so schnell wie möglich los. Als ich hier ankam, sah ich Meister Danrok und ... als Nächstes habe ich auf seine Wunde gedrückt und geflucht." {n}Einrich blickt verwirrt auf seine blutigen Hände.{/n} "Von wegen heldenhafter Mechaniker. Ich war nicht von großem Nutzen, oder?"

languages.text: «No tuve ocasión. Venía de camino para ofrecer una plegaria cuando oí los disparos y acudí tan pronto como pude. Cuando llegué, vi al maestro Danrok y... Creo que lo siguiente que hice fue hacer presión en su herida y proferir improperios». {n}Einrich se mira las manos ensangrentadas con expresión confundida.{/n} «Menudo reparador estoy hecho. No he servido de mucho, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "I did not. I was on my way to offer a prayer when I heard gunfire and ran as fast as I could. When I got here, I saw Master Danrok, and... I think the next thing I did was just to press his wound and spout curses." {n}Einrich looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I wasn't much use, was I?"

traits.locale_text: «No tuve ocasión. Venía de camino para ofrecer una plegaria cuando oí los disparos y acudí tan pronto como pude. Cuando llegué, vi al maestro Danrok y... Creo que lo siguiente que hice fue hacer presión en su herida y proferir improperios». {n}Einrich se mira las manos ensangrentadas con expresión confundida.{/n} «Menudo reparador estoy hecho. No he servido de mucho, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: 「そんなことはしていません。祈りを捧げに行く途中に銃声が聞こえたので、全速力で駆けつけました。ここに着いてダンロック氏を見かけ、それから…その後はただ彼の傷を押さえて、少し汚い言葉を吐いたくらだと思います」{n}アインリッヒは混乱して血まみれの手を見る。{/n}「ヒーローの修理工もここまでですね。私は役に立たなかったのでしょう？」
languages.original_text: "I did not. I was on my way to offer a prayer when I heard gunfire and ran as fast as I could. When I got here, I saw Master Danrok, and... I think the next thing I did was just to press his wound and spout curses." {n}Einrich looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I wasn't much use, was I?"

traits.locale_text: 「そんなことはしていません。祈りを捧げに行く途中に銃声が聞こえたので、全速力で駆けつけました。ここに着いてダンロック氏を見かけ、それから…その後はただ彼の傷を押さえて、少し汚い言葉を吐いたくらだと思います」{n}アインリッヒは混乱して血まみれの手を見る。{/n}「ヒーローの修理工もここまでですね。私は役に立たなかったのでしょう？」

languages.text: “我没看到。当时我正准备去祈祷，但突然听到了枪声，于是我以最快的速度冲了过来。当我赶到的时候，我看到了丹罗克大师……我接下来做的事情，好像就是紧紧地捂住他的伤口，咒骂袭击者。”{n}艾因里奇困惑地看着自己沾满鲜血的双手。{/n}“这个所谓的‘英雄维修员工’好像没派上什么用场，是吧？”
languages.original_text: "I did not. I was on my way to offer a prayer when I heard gunfire and ran as fast as I could. When I got here, I saw Master Danrok, and... I think the next thing I did was just to press his wound and spout curses." {n}Einrich looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I wasn't much use, was I?"

traits.locale_text: “我没看到。当时我正准备去祈祷，但突然听到了枪声，于是我以最快的速度冲了过来。当我赶到的时候，我看到了丹罗克大师……我接下来做的事情，好像就是紧紧地捂住他的伤口，咒骂袭击者。”{n}艾因里奇困惑地看着自己沾满鲜血的双手。{/n}“这个所谓的‘英雄维修员工’好像没派上什么用场，是吧？”

languages.text: « Non, j'étais en chemin pour aller prier quand j'ai entendu des coups de feu. J'ai accouru aussitôt et à mon arrivée, j'ai vu maître Danrok et... Je n'ai rien trouvé de mieux à faire que de jurer comme un charretier tout en appuyant sur sa blessure pour contenir l'hémorragie. » {n}Einrich regarde ses mains ensanglantées d'un air confus.{/n} « Autrement dit, ce n'est pas aujourd'hui que je me serais illustré par mon héroïsme. Je me suis révélé parfaitement inutile. »
languages.original_text: "I did not. I was on my way to offer a prayer when I heard gunfire and ran as fast as I could. When I got here, I saw Master Danrok, and... I think the next thing I did was just to press his wound and spout curses." {n}Einrich looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I wasn't much use, was I?"

traits.locale_text: « Non, j'étais en chemin pour aller prier quand j'ai entendu des coups de feu. J'ai accouru aussitôt et à mon arrivée, j'ai vu maître Danrok et... Je n'ai rien trouvé de mieux à faire que de jurer comme un charretier tout en appuyant sur sa blessure pour contenir l'hémorragie. » {n}Einrich regarde ses mains ensanglantées d'un air confus.{/n} « Autrement dit, ce n'est pas aujourd'hui que je me serais illustré par mon héroïsme. Je me suis révélé parfaitement inutile. »

languages.text: "Görmedim. Silah seslerini duyduğumda dua etmeye gidiyordum ve tüm hızımla buraya koştum. Geldiğimde Üstat Danrok'u gördüm ve... Yaptığım bir sonraki şey yarasına basınç uygulamak ve lanetler sarf etmekti." {n}Einrich kafası karışık bir hâlde kanlı ellerine bakıyor.{/n} "Kahraman tamircilik buraya kadarmış. Pek de işe yaramadım, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "I did not. I was on my way to offer a prayer when I heard gunfire and ran as fast as I could. When I got here, I saw Master Danrok, and... I think the next thing I did was just to press his wound and spout curses." {n}Einrich looks at his bloodied hands in confusion.{/n} "So much for being a heroic repairman. I wasn't much use, was I?"
